metadata.title: CVE-2019-8551 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A logic issue was addressed with improved validation. This issue is fixedin iOS 12.2, tvOS 12.2, Safari 12.1, iTunes 12.9.4 for Windows, iCloud forWindows 7.11. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead touniversal cross site scripting.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8551` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.24.1-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.24.1-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.24.1-1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.24.1-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.24.1-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.24.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.24.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.24.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.24.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.24.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.24.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.24.1-1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.24.1-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.24.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.24.1-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
